sentences.en: A band of gray hair encircled his bald dome.
sentences.cn: 他的秃头顶四周长着一圈灰白的头发.

sentences.en: A band of grey hair encircled his bald dome.
sentences.cn: 他的秃头四周长着一圈灰白的头发.

sentences.en: Are these pillars strong enough to keep up that dome?
sentences.cn: 这几根柱子撑得住那个圆形屋顶 吗 ?

sentences.en: He watched the coffee beating in the cracked dome of the percolator.
sentences.cn: 他注视着咖啡壶破裂的圆顶内翻腾的咖啡.

sentences.en: Oligocene erosion had truncated the sediments draped over the dome.
sentences.cn: 覆盖于穹丘上的沉积岩为渐新世侵蚀所截削.

sentences.en: She looked at the blue dome of the sky.
The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
sentences.cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

sentences.en: The clock stands on an oval marble base, enclosed by a glass dome.
sentences.cn: 钟放在椭圆形的大理石基座上，外罩玻璃罩。

sentences.en: the dome of St Paul's Cathedral
The dome of St. Paul's Cathedral is well - known in London.
sentences.cn: 圣保罗教堂的圆顶在伦敦是人人知晓的.

sentences.en: The dome was supported by nine columns.
sentences.cn: 这圆顶由九根柱子支撑.

sentences.en: The dome was supported by white marble columns.
sentences.cn: 圆顶由白色大理石柱支撑着.

sentences.en: The fundus is the dome of the stomach.
The great vault brightened, like the dome of an immense lamp.
sentences.cn: 那广漠的天穹变得雪亮, 犹如一盏巨灯的圆顶.

sentences.en: They formed the dome with the tree's branches.
sentences.cn: 他们用树枝搭成圆屋顶.

words.tran_cn: 凸起；[矿业] 成拱作用
在…上加穹顶；隆起成穹顶状（dome的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 穹状构造；穹隆构造；穹窿构造

trans.tran_cn: 穹顶，圆屋顶，圆顶状物，穹状建筑物
trans.tran_en: a round roof on a building
